item.title: 爱沙尼亚中央银行行长抨击国际货币基金组织与俄罗斯重新合作的计划
item.description: 爱沙尼亚央行行长与一些欧洲财长一道，批评国际货币基金组织自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来首次重启对其经济审查的计划。【原文：Estonia’s central bank chief joined a group of European finance ministers in criticizing the International Monetary Fund’s plan to restart reviews of Russia economy for the first time since its invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 津巴布韦通过加强矿山监控打击黄金走私
item.description: 津巴布韦矿业部长温斯顿-奇坦多 (Winston Chitando) 周一表示，津巴布韦计划通过加强对矿区的监控来解决猖獗的黄金走私问题。【原文：Zimbabwe plans to tackle rampant gold smuggling by increasing surveillance at mining sites, Mines Minister Winston Chitando said Monday.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行货币政策审查将触及工具箱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲中央银行的货币政策战略审查将重点关注大流行病后经济会发生什么变化，以及官员们在制定政策时能学到什么。【原文：The European Central Bank’s monetary-policy strategy review will focus on what happens to the economy after the pandemic and what officials can learn for policymaking, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行应保持渐进式降息策略
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲央行应坚持其谨慎的降息立场；这进一步加强了人们对欧洲央行将于12月而非10月进行下一次降息的预期。【原文：The European Central Bank should stick with its cautious stance on lowering interest rates, Chief Economist Philip Lane said — further strengthening expectations for the next cut to come in December rather than October.】

item.title: 英国石油公司将出售美国陆上风电业务
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）计划出售其在美国的陆上风电业务，以专注于其太阳能部门 Lightsource BP。【原文：BP Plc plans to sell its onshore wind business in the US as it focuses on its solar arm Lightsource BP.】

item.title: 泰坦尼克号船厂业主准备本周进入管理阶段
item.description: 建造泰坦尼克号的船厂的所有者正在进入英国的破产管理程序。【原文：The owner of the shipping yard that built the Titanic is entering administration, a type of insolvency procedure in the UK.】

item.title: 投资者认为哈里斯获胜对债券有利，对股票不利
item.description:
专业投资者在一项独家民意调查中表示，特朗普可能会对市场产生更大影响。【原文：

Trump could move markets more, professional investors say in an exclusive poll.

】

item.title: Silver Point 完成 46 亿美元机会型信贷基金募集
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，Silver Point Capital 完成了一项 46 亿美元的机会主义信贷基金，超过了其 40 亿美元的目标。【原文：Silver Point Capital closed a $4.6 billion opportunistic credit fund, exceeding its target of $4 billion, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 台湾监管机构否决 CTBC 以 41 亿美元收购新光的申请
item.description: 台湾监管机构否决了 CTBC 金融控股公司（CTBC Financial Holding Co.【原文：Taiwan regulators rejected CTBC Financial Holding Co.’s $4.1 billion takeover bid for smaller rival Shin Kong Financial Holding Co., blocking the creation of what would have been the island’s biggest financial group.】

item.title: 凯雷收购房地产金融公司 North Bridge 股份
item.description: 凯雷正在收购 North Bridge ESG LLC 的少数股权，该公司是一家专注于向业主提供清洁能源项目私人信用贷款的金融公司。【原文：Carlyle is buying a minority stake in North Bridge ESG LLC, a finance firm that focuses on a type of private credit lending to landlords for clean energy projects.】

item.title: 燃气动力重新崛起，推动数据中心蓬勃发展
item.description:
美国的公用事业公司正在兴建一系列污染严重的工厂，使政府的清洁能源目标更加遥不可及。【原文：

Utilities in the US are building a slew of polluting plants, putting the government’s clean-energy goals further from reach.

】

item.title: Waymo 将目光投向 "高级 "机器人出租车乘客
item.description: Waymo 正在增加付费乘客，并与合作伙伴达成协议，努力使其机器人出租车服务变得可行。但首先...【原文：Waymo is adding paying passengers and reaching deals with partners to try to make its robotaxi service viable. But first...】

item.title: 国际清算银行（BIS）警告：市场面临套利交易平仓的类似波动风险
item.description: 国际清算银行警告说，金融体系很容易再次出现像今年夏天流行的对冲基金策略崩溃时波及整个市场那样的波动。【原文：The Bank for International Settlements is warning the financial system is prone to repeat episodes of volatility like the one that rippled across markets this summer when a popular hedge fund strategy collapsed.】

item.title: 如果 TikTok 在美国与禁止 TikTok 的法律斗争中失败，将会发生什么？
item.description: TikTok 在美国正迈向关键时刻。【原文：TikTok is heading toward its moment of truth in the US.】

item.title: 美国大豆如此便宜，连竞争对手阿根廷都在购买
item.description: 阿根廷是世界上最大的加工豆粕和豆油出口国，由于美国豆油价格下降，成为世界上最便宜的豆油，阿根廷将自 2019 年以来首次从美国进口全豆。【原文：Argentina, the world’s biggest exporter of processed soybean meal and oil, is set to bring in whole beans from the US for the first since 2019 as declining American prices make them the cheapest in the world.】

item.title: TikTok 在关键的上诉法院对峙中对抗美国 "非卖即禁 "法律
item.description: 中国社交媒体应用 TikTok 周一在美国法院系统将其与美国禁令的斗争推向新的高度。【原文：Chinese-owned social media app TikTok takes its fight against a US ban to the next level in the American court system Monday.】

item.title: 债券受托人就法院驳回 XJ 公司清盘申请提出上诉
item.description: 由一些亚洲最著名对冲基金持有的新疆国际控股股份有限公司（XJ International Holdings Co.【原文：A trustee of XJ International Holdings Co.’s convertible bond, held by some of Asia’s most prominent hedge funds, is trying revive a liquidation petition against the Chinese education firm.】

item.title: 在最乐观的联合国方案中，核电将表现不佳
item.description: 尽管各国都在按计划大幅增加原子能发电量，但世界大国去年制定的雄心勃勃的核能目标不太可能实现。【原文：The ambitious nuclear-energy targets set by world powers last year are unlikely to be achieved, even though nations are on track to dramatically increase atomic-power generation.】

item.title: 雀巢获得罕见的 "卖出 "评级，摩根士丹利再添质疑声潮
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）对雀巢公司（Nestle SA）作出了罕见的负面评级，转而看空这家消费品巨头，使近期分析师的观点发生了转变。【原文：Nestle SA received a rare negative rating as Morgan Stanley turned bearish on the consumer-goods giant, adding to a recent turn in the tide of analyst opinion.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美元跌至八个月来的最低水平，交易员们对美联储本周的降息幅度意见不一，咖啡价格飙升。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The dollar drops to the lowest level in eight months, traders are divided on how big a cut in interest rates the Federal Reserve will deliver this week and coffee prices soar. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: 伊斯坦布尔顶级游艇码头的科克统治结束，建筑商在拍卖中胜出
item.description: 一家名不见经传的建筑商赢得了伊斯坦布尔费内巴切-卡拉米斯游艇码头的经营权，从而获得了土耳其最大企业集团之一已持有数十年的资产。【原文：A little-known builder won the right to operate Istanbul’s Fenerbahce-Kalamis Yacht Marina, clinching an asset that had been held by one of Turkey’s biggest conglomerates for decades.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行和丹斯克银行称欧洲央行将辜负市场降息预期
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Bank Plc）和丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）的策略师表示，欧洲央行的降息步伐可能会比市场预期的要慢。【原文：Barclays Bank Plc and Danske Bank A/S strategists say the pace of interest-rate cuts by the European Central Bank may prove slower than the market is pricing.】

item.title: 洪灾导致数百万人流离失所，西非准备迎接更多降雨
item.description: 西非本周将面临更多暴雨，此前该地区曾发生洪灾，仅 2024 年就有至少 230 万人因洪水上涨而流离失所。【原文：West Africa faces more heavy rains this week after flooding in a region that’s seen at least 2.3 million people displaced by rising waters in 2024 alone.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动美国燃气发电意外复苏
item.description:
新天然气工厂不断涌现，打破了人们对其快速增长即将结束的预期。【原文：

New gas plants just keep on coming, defying expectations that their rapid growth was nearing an end.

】

item.title: 中国对稀土的控制削弱了从美国到日本的项目
item.description: 在休斯顿郊外几小时车程的地方，陶氏化学公司（Dow Chemical Co.）工厂附近的一个偏僻田野里，美国为削弱中国对全球稀土矿供应的控制而进行的对高科技至关重要的努力尚未破土动工。【原文：A couple hours outside Houston, in a remote field near a Dow Chemical Co. plant, America’s bid to undercut China’s grip on the global supply of rare earth minerals critical to high technology has yet to break ground.】

item.title: 美联储降息在即，股票期权交易商采取防御措施
item.description: 在本周备受瞩目的美联储会议召开之前，股市投资者正采取防御措施，转向传统上较为安全的板块，即使市场情绪倾向于央行更大幅度的降息。【原文：Stock market investors are playing defense ahead of this week’s highly anticipated Federal Reserve meeting following a shift toward traditionally safer sectors, even as sentiment edges toward a larger interest-rate cut by the central bank.】

item.title: 贝莱德请回卡马拉-哈里斯的顾问派尔担任要职
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）将重新聘用卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的前高级助手、该公司的前任高管迈克-派尔（Mike Pyle），从而加强这家全球最大的资金管理公司与华盛顿之间的密切联系。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is rehiring Mike Pyle, a former senior aide to Kamala Harris and one-time executive at the firm, strengthening the close ties between the world’s largest money manager and Washington.】

item.title: 阿达尼和威尔玛将于下月开始出售合资企业股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）和威尔玛国际有限公司（Wilmar International Ltd.）预计最早将于下月开始出售其消费合资企业阿达尼威尔玛有限公司（Adani Wilmar Ltd.）的少数股权，以遵守持股规定。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. and Wilmar International Ltd. are expected to start the sale of a minority stake in their consumer joint venture Adani Wilmar Ltd. as early as next month to abide by shareholding regulations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗称特朗普和哈里斯的政纲均不利于股市
item.description: 花旗集团策略师认为，唐纳德-特朗普和卡马拉-哈里斯的政纲似乎都对美国股市不利，其中民主党候选人提高企业税的计划影响最大。【原文：Both Donald Trump’s and Kamala Harris’s political platforms appear negative for US equities, with the Democratic candidate’s plans to raise corporate tax seen having the biggest impact, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师称股市反弹的增长因素大于美联储因素
item.description: 华尔街顶级策略师认为，美联储本周备受期待的降息幅度与美国经济的健康状况相比，与股票的关系不大。【原文：The size of the Federal Reserve’s highly anticipated interest-rate cut this week is less relevant for equities than the health of the US economy, according to top Wall Street strategists.】
